Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights total bit apprehensive reading reviews suprisingly disappointed average size 4 nights 9th floor overlooking main street noisy daytime windows night 13th floor slightly quieter beds comfortable pillows uncomfortable bathroom basic shower figuring hot water cleaning poor especially bathroom speaking difference views roof terrace amazing pool cold water receptionist staff friendly welcoming especially anthony louis location minutes walk town hall mins walk circular quay darling harbour china town monorail stop hotel mcdonalds mccafe road breakfast options convenient starts woolworths road especially stocking water snacks buying near tourist sights means paying double prices kindly stored bags fee travelling days returning advantage comparing hotels slightly bigger beat price booked special offer location especially spent days leaving returning late
